message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value to us and its potential to enhance your experience, I propose a price of $110 for it. This offer includes all the features you're looking for and more. Let me know if this works for you!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're placing on the product. However, I'm looking to stay within a budget of $100. Would you be willing to consider a price of $95?

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to negotiate further. Considering the value of the product and aiming for a mutually beneficial agreement, I propose a price of $100 for the product. This aligns closely with your budget while still allowing us to cover our costs. Please let me know if this revised offer meets your needs.
